A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I thought the Force Awakens was a soulless cash grab. An insulting\, empty film. But this? This was just plain STUPID. Zero character development\, the characters start and end in the same place\, the STORY does not move forward. What the F*CK is Kathleen Kennedy thinking?? The balance has shifted. We have 5 lousy films and 4 awesome ones. Hopefully Solo will set the balance again... What an absolute travesty.
